an5:73.1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5:73.1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5:73.1.3_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu dhammavihārī hotī”ti?
an5:73.2.2_0: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an5:73.2.3_0: So tāya dhammapariyattiyā divasaṁ atināmeti, riñcati paṭisallānaṁ,
an5:73.2.4_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu pariyattibahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5:73.3.1_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti.
an5:73.3.2_0: So tāya dhammapaññattiyā divasaṁ atināmeti, riñcati paṭisallānaṁ,
an5:73.3.3_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu paññattibahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5:73.4.1_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti.
an5:73.4.2_0: So tena sajjhāyena divasaṁ atināmeti, riñcati paṭisallānaṁ,
an5:73.4.3_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu sajjhāyabahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5:73.5.1_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati.
an5:73.5.2_0: So tehi dhammavitakkehi divasaṁ atināmeti, riñcati paṭisallānaṁ,
an5:73.5.3_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu vitakkabahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5:73.6.2_0: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an5:73.6.3_0: So tāya dhammapariyattiyā na divasaṁ atināmeti, nāpi riñcati paṭisallānaṁ,
an5:73.6.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhammavihārī hoti.
an5:73.7.1_0: Iti kho, bhikkhu, desito mayā pariyattibahulo, desito paññattibahulo, desito sajjhāyabahulo, desito vitakkabahulo, desito dhammavihārī.
an5:73.7.2_1: satthārā karaṇīyaṁ sāvakānaṁ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṁ upādāya, kataṁ vo taṁ mayā.
an5:73.7.3_0: Etāni, bhikkhu, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyatha, bhikkhu, mā pamādattha,
an5:73.7.3_1: mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṁ vo amhākaṁ anusāsanī”ti.

an5:74.1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5:74.1.3_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu dhammavihārī hotī”ti?
an5:74.2.2_0: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ;
an5:74.2.4_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu pariyattibahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5:74.3.1_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti,
an5:74.3.2_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu paññattibahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5:74.4.1_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti,
an5:74.4.2_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu sajjhāyabahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5:74.5.1_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati,
an5:74.5.2_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu vitakkabahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5:74.6.2_0: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ;
an5:74.6.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhammavihārī hoti.
an5:74.7.1_0: Iti kho, bhikkhu, desito mayā pariyattibahulo, desito paññattibahulo, desito sajjhāyabahulo, desito vitakkabahulo, desito dhammavihārī.
an5:74.7.2_1: satthārā karaṇīyaṁ sāvakānaṁ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṁ upādāya, kataṁ vo taṁ mayā.
an5:74.7.3_0: Etāni, bhikkhu, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyatha bhikkhu, mā pamādattha,
an5:74.7.3_1: mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṁ vo amhākaṁ anusāsanī”ti.
an5:75.1.3_1: ekacco yodhājīvo rajaggaññeva disvā saṁsīdati visīdati na santhambhati na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ.
an5:75.2.2_0: api ca kho dhajaggaññeva disvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ.
an5:75.3.1_1: idhekacco yodhājīvo sahati rajaggaṁ sahati dhajaggaṁ;
an5:75.3.2_0: api ca kho ussāraṇaññeva sutvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ.
an5:75.4.1_1: idhekacco yodhājīvo sahati rajaggaṁ, sahati dhajaggaṁ, sahati ussāraṇaṁ;
an5:75.4.2_0: api ca kho sampahāre haññati byāpajjati.
an5:75.5.1_1: idhekacco yodhājīvo sahati rajaggaṁ, sahati dhajaggaṁ, sahati ussāraṇaṁ, sahati sampahāraṁ.
an5:75.5.2_0: So taṁ saṅgāmaṁ abhivijinitvā vijitasaṅgāmo tameva saṅgāmasīsaṁ ajjhāvasati.
an5:75.6.1_1: pañcime yodhājīvūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā bhikkhūsu.
an5:75.6.3_1: bhikkhu rajaggaññeva disvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati,
an5:75.6.7_0: ‘amukasmiṁ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā kumārī vā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā’ti.
an5:75.6.8_0: So taṁ sutvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati,
an5:75.7.1_1: yodhājīvo rajaggaññeva disvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ;
an5:75.7.4_1: paṭhamo yodhājīvūpamo puggalo santo saṁvijjamāno bhikkhūsu.
an5:75.8.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajaggaṁ;
an5:75.8.2_0: api ca kho dhajaggaññeva disvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati,
an5:75.8.5_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho suṇāti:
an5:75.8.6_0: ‘amukasmiṁ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā kumārī vā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā’ti;
an5:75.8.7_0: api ca kho sāmaṁ passati itthiṁ vā kumāriṁ vā abhirūpaṁ dassanīyaṁ pāsādikaṁ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṁ.
an5:75.8.8_0: So taṁ disvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati,
an5:75.9.1_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, yodhājīvo sahati rajaggaṁ;
an5:75.9.2_0: api ca kho dhajaggaññeva disvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ;
an5:75.9.5_1: dutiyo yodhājīvūpamo puggalo santo saṁvijjamāno bhikkhūsu.
an5:75.10.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajaggaṁ, sahati dhajaggaṁ;
an5:75.10.2_0: api ca kho ussāraṇaññeva sutvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati,
an5:75.10.5_1: bhikkhuṁ araññagataṁ vā rukkhamūlagataṁ vā suññāgāragataṁ vā mātugāmo upasaṅkamitvā ūhasati ullapati ujjagghati uppaṇḍeti.
an5:75.10.6_0: So mātugāmena ūhasiyamāno ullapiyamāno ujjagghiyamāno uppaṇḍiyamāno saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati,
an5:75.11.1_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, yodhājīvo sahati rajaggaṁ, sahati dhajaggaṁ;
an5:75.11.2_0: api ca kho ussāraṇaññeva sutvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ;
an5:75.11.5_1: tatiyo yodhājīvūpamo puggalo santo saṁvijjamāno bhikkhūsu.
an5:75.12.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajaggaṁ, sahati dhajaggaṁ, sahati ussāraṇaṁ;
an5:75.12.2_0: api ca kho sampahāre haññati byāpajjati.
an5:75.12.4_1: bhikkhuṁ araññagataṁ vā rukkhamūlagataṁ vā suññāgāragataṁ vā mātugāmo upasaṅkamitvā abhinisīdati abhinipajjati ajjhottharati.
an5:75.12.5_0: So mātugāmena abhinisīdiyamāno abhinipajjiyamāno ajjhotthariyamāno sikkhaṁ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṁ anāvikatvā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati.
an5:75.13.1_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, yodhājīvo sahati rajaggaṁ, sahati dhajaggaṁ, sahati ussāraṇaṁ,
an5:75.13.1_1: api ca kho sampahāre haññati byāpajjati;
an5:75.13.4_1: catuttho yodhājīvūpamo puggalo santo saṁvijjamāno bhikkhūsu.
an5:75.14.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajaggaṁ, sahati dhajaggaṁ, sahati ussāraṇaṁ, sahati sampahāraṁ,
an5:75.14.1_1: so taṁ saṅgāmaṁ abhivijinitvā vijitasaṅgāmo tameva saṅgāmasīsaṁ ajjhāvasati.
an5:75.14.3_1: bhikkhuṁ araññagataṁ vā rukkhamūlagataṁ vā suññāgāragataṁ vā mātugāmo upasaṅkamitvā abhinisīdati abhinipajjati ajjhottharati.
an5:75.14.4_0: So mātugāmena abhinisīdiyamāno abhinipajjiyamāno ajjhotthariyamāno viniveṭhetvā vinimocetvā yena kāmaṁ pakkamati.
an5:75.14.5_0: So vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajati araññaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pabbataṁ kandaraṁ giriguhaṁ susānaṁ vanapatthaṁ abbhokāsaṁ palālapuñjaṁ.
an5:75.15.1_0: So araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
an5:75.15.2_0: So abhijjhaṁ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharati,
an5:75.15.4_0: thinamiddhaṁ pahāya vigatathinamiddho viharati ālokasaññī sato sampajāno,
an5:75.15.5_0: uddhaccakukkuccaṁ pahāya anuddhato viharati ajjhattaṁ vūpasantacitto,
an5:75.15.6_0: vicikicchaṁ pahāya tiṇṇavicikiccho viharati akathaṅkathī kusalesu dhammesu,
an5:75.15.7_0: So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe
an5:75.16.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṁ khayañāṇāya cittaṁ abhininnāmeti.
an5:75.16.4_0: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati,
an5:75.17.1_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, yodhājīvo sahati rajaggaṁ, sahati dhajaggaṁ, sahati ussāraṇaṁ, sahati sampahāraṁ,
an5:75.17.1_1: so taṁ saṅgāmaṁ abhivijinitvā vijitasaṅgāmo tameva saṅgāmasīsaṁ ajjhāvasati;
an5:75.17.4_1: pañcamo yodhājīvūpamo puggalo santo saṁvijjamāno bhikkhūsu.
an5:75.17.5_1: pañca yodhājīvūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā bhikkhūsū”ti.
an5:76.1.3_1: ekacco yodhājīvo asicammaṁ gahetvā dhanukalāpaṁ sannayhitvā viyūḷhaṁ saṅgāmaṁ otarati.
an5:76.1.5_0: Tamenaṁ ussahantaṁ vāyamantaṁ pare hananti pariyāpādenti.
an5:76.2.1_1: idhekacco yodhājīvo asicammaṁ gahetvā dhanukalāpaṁ sannayhitvā viyūḷhaṁ saṅgāmaṁ otarati.
an5:76.2.3_0: Tamenaṁ ussahantaṁ vāyamantaṁ pare upalikkhanti, tamenaṁ apanenti;
an5:76.2.5_0: So ñātakehi nīyamāno appatvāva ñātake antarāmagge kālaṁ karoti.
an5:76.3.1_1: idhekacco yodhājīvo asicammaṁ gahetvā dhanukalāpaṁ sannayhitvā viyūḷhaṁ saṅgāmaṁ otarati.
an5:76.3.3_0: Tamenaṁ ussahantaṁ vāyamantaṁ pare upalikkhanti, tamenaṁ apanenti;
an5:76.3.6_0: So ñātakehi upaṭṭhahiyamāno paricariyamāno teneva ābādhena kālaṁ karoti.

an5:76.18.1_1: bhikkhu aññataraṁ gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā upanissāya viharati.
an5:76.18.2_0: So pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati rakkhiteneva kāyena rakkhitāya vācāya rakkhitena cittena upaṭṭhitāya satiyā saṁvutehi indriyehi.
an5:76.18.3_0: So cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
an5:76.18.4_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ, tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati; rakkhati cakkhundriyaṁ;
an5:76.18.9_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
an5:76.18.10_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ, tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati; rakkhati manindriyaṁ; manindriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjati.
an5:76.18.12_0: vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajati araññaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pabbataṁ kandaraṁ giriguhaṁ susānaṁ vanapatthaṁ abbhokāsaṁ palālapuñjaṁ.
an5:76.18.13_0: So araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
an5:76.18.14_0: So abhijjhaṁ loke pahāya …pe… so ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe
an5:76.18.15_0: vivicceva kāmehi …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an5:76.19.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṁ khayañāṇāya cittaṁ abhininnāmeti.

an5:76.20.3_1: pañcamo yodhājīvūpamo puggalo santo saṁvijjamāno bhikkhūsu.

an5:77.1.1_1: anāgatabhayāni sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:77.2.4_0: Ekakaṁ kho pana maṁ araññe viharantaṁ
an5:77.2.5_0: ahi vā maṁ ḍaṁseyya, vicchiko vā maṁ ḍaṁseyya, satapadī vā maṁ ḍaṁseyya,
an5:77.2.6_0: tena me assa kālaṅkiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo;
an5:77.2.7_0: handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an5:77.2.8_1: paṭhamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:77.3.4_1: bhattaṁ vā bhuttaṁ me byāpajjeyya, pittaṁ vā me kuppeyya, semhaṁ vā me kuppeyya,
an5:77.3.5_0: tena me assa kālaṅkiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo;
an5:77.3.6_0: handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an5:77.3.7_1: dutiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:77.4.4_1: sīhena vā byagghena vā dīpinā vā acchena vā taracchena vā, te maṁ jīvitā voropeyyuṁ,
an5:77.4.5_0: tena me assa kālaṅkiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo;
an5:77.4.6_0: handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an5:77.4.7_1: tatiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:77.5.4_0: māṇavehi samāgaccheyyaṁ katakammehi vā akatakammehi vā, te maṁ jīvitā voropeyyuṁ,
an5:77.5.5_0: tena me assa kālaṅkiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo;
an5:77.5.6_0: handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an5:77.5.7_1: catutthaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:77.6.3_0: Santi kho panāraññe vāḷā amanussā, te maṁ jīvitā voropeyyuṁ,
an5:77.6.4_0: tena me assa kālaṅkiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo;
an5:77.6.5_0: handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an5:77.6.6_1: pañcamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:77.7.1_1: pañca anāgatabhayāni sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
an5:78.1.1_1: anāgatabhayāni sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:78.1.4_0: ‘ahaṁ kho etarahi daharo yuvā susukāḷakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato paṭhamena vayasā.
an5:78.1.5_0: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṁ imaṁ kāyaṁ jarā phusati.
an5:78.1.6_0: Jiṇṇena kho pana jarāya abhibhūtena na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ,
an5:78.1.6_1: na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṁ.
an5:78.1.7_0: Purā maṁ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5:78.1.8_0: handāhaṁ paṭikacceva vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya,
an5:78.1.8_1: yenāhaṁ dhammena samannāgato jiṇṇakopi phāsuṁ viharissāmī’ti.
an5:78.1.9_1: paṭhamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:78.2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5:78.2.2_0: ‘ahaṁ kho etarahi appābādho appātaṅko samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato nātisītāya nāccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya.
an5:78.2.3_0: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṁ imaṁ kāyaṁ byādhi phusati.
an5:78.2.4_0: Byādhitena kho pana byādhinā abhibhūtena na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ,
an5:78.2.4_1: na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṁ.
an5:78.2.5_0: Purā maṁ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5:78.2.6_0: handāhaṁ paṭikacceva vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya,
an5:78.2.6_1: yenāhaṁ dhammena samannāgato byādhitopi phāsuṁ viharissāmī’ti.
an5:78.2.7_1: dutiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:78.3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5:78.3.3_0: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṁ dubbhikkhaṁ hoti dussassaṁ dullabhapiṇḍaṁ,
an5:78.3.4_0: Dubbhikkhe kho pana manussā yena subhikkhaṁ tena saṅkamanti.
an5:78.3.6_0: Saṅgaṇikavihāre kho pana sati ākiṇṇavihāre na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ,
an5:78.3.6_1: na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṁ.
an5:78.3.7_0: Purā maṁ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5:78.3.8_0: handāhaṁ paṭikacceva vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya,
an5:78.3.8_1: yenāhaṁ dhammena samannāgato dubbhikkhepi phāsu viharissāmī’ti.
an5:78.3.9_1: tatiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:78.4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5:78.4.2_0: ‘etarahi kho manussā samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharanti.
an5:78.4.3_0: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṁ bhayaṁ hoti aṭavisaṅkopo,
an5:78.4.4_0: Bhaye kho pana sati manussā yena khemaṁ tena saṅkamanti.
an5:78.4.6_0: Saṅgaṇikavihāre kho pana sati ākiṇṇavihāre na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ,
an5:78.4.6_1: na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṁ.
an5:78.4.7_0: Purā maṁ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5:78.4.8_0: handāhaṁ paṭikacceva vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya,
an5:78.4.8_1: yenāhaṁ dhammena samannāgato bhayepi phāsuṁ viharissāmī’ti.
an5:78.4.9_1: catutthaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:78.5.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5:78.5.2_0: ‘etarahi kho saṅgho samaggo sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharati.
an5:78.5.3_0: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṁ saṅgho bhijjati.
an5:78.5.4_0: Saṅghe kho pana bhinne na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ,
an5:78.5.4_1: na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṁ.
an5:78.5.5_0: Purā maṁ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5:78.5.6_0: handāhaṁ paṭikacceva vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya,
an5:78.5.6_1: yenāhaṁ dhammena samannāgato bhinnepi saṅghe phāsuṁ viharissāmī’ti.
an5:78.5.7_1: pañcamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:78.6.1_1: pañca anāgatabhayāni sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
an5:79.2.2_1: bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5:79.2.3_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā aññe upasampādessanti.
an5:79.2.4_0: Tepi na sakkhissanti vinetuṁ adhisīle adhicitte adhipaññāya.
an5:79.2.5_0: Tepi bhavissanti abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5:79.2.6_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā aññe upasampādessanti.
an5:79.2.7_0: Tepi na sakkhissanti vinetuṁ adhisīle adhicitte adhipaññāya.
an5:79.2.8_0: Tepi bhavissanti abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5:79.2.11_1: paṭhamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5:79.3.1_1: bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5:79.3.2_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā aññesaṁ nissayaṁ dassanti.
an5:79.3.3_0: Tepi na sakkhissanti vinetuṁ adhisīle adhicitte adhipaññāya.
an5:79.3.4_0: Tepi bhavissanti abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5:79.3.5_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā aññesaṁ nissayaṁ dassanti.
an5:79.3.6_0: Tepi na sakkhissanti vinetuṁ adhisīle adhicitte adhipaññāya.
an5:79.3.7_0: Tepi bhavissanti abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5:79.3.10_1: dutiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5:79.4.1_1: bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5:79.4.2_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā abhidhammakathaṁ vedallakathaṁ kathentā kaṇhadhammaṁ okkamamānā na bujjhissanti.
an5:79.4.5_1: tatiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5:79.5.1_1: bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5:79.5.2_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā ye te suttantā tathāgatabhāsitā gambhīrā gambhīratthā lokuttarā suññatāppaṭisaṁyuttā,
an5:79.5.2_1: tesu bhaññamānesu na sussūsissanti, na sotaṁ odahissanti,
an5:79.5.2_3: na ca te dhamme uggahetabbaṁ pariyāpuṇitabbaṁ maññissanti.
an5:79.5.3_0: Ye pana te suttantā kavitā kāveyyā cittakkharā cittabyañjanā bāhirakā sāvakabhāsitā,
an5:79.5.3_1: tesu bhaññamānesu sussūsissanti, sotaṁ odahissanti, aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhapessanti,
an5:79.5.3_2: te ca dhamme uggahetabbaṁ pariyāpuṇitabbaṁ maññissanti.
an5:79.5.6_1: catutthaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5:79.6.1_1: bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5:79.6.2_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā therā bhikkhū bāhulikā bhavissanti sāthalikā okkamane pubbaṅgamā paviveke nikkhittadhurā,
an5:79.6.2_1: na vīriyaṁ ārabhissanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:79.6.4_0: Sāpi bhavissati bāhulikā sāthalikā okkamane pubbaṅgamā paviveke nikkhittadhurā,
an5:79.6.4_1: na vīriyaṁ ārabhissati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5:79.6.7_1: pañcamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5:79.7.1_1: pañca anāgatabhayāni etarahi asamuppannāni āyatiṁ samuppajjissanti.
an5:80.2.3_0: Te cīvare kalyāṇakāmā samānā riñcissanti paṁsukūlikattaṁ,
an5:80.2.4_1: cīvarahetu ca anekavihitaṁ anesanaṁ appatirūpaṁ āpajjissanti.
an5:80.2.5_1: paṭhamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5:80.3.2_0: Te piṇḍapāte kalyāṇakāmā samānā riñcissanti piṇḍapātikattaṁ,
an5:80.3.3_0: gāmanigamarājadhānīsu osaritvā vāsaṁ kappessanti jivhaggena rasaggāni pariyesamānā,
an5:80.3.3_1: piṇḍapātahetu ca anekavihitaṁ anesanaṁ appatirūpaṁ āpajjissanti.
an5:80.3.4_1: dutiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5:80.4.2_0: Te senāsane kalyāṇakāmā samānā riñcissanti rukkhamūlikattaṁ,
an5:80.4.3_1: senāsanahetu ca anekavihitaṁ anesanaṁ appatirūpaṁ āpajjissanti.
an5:80.4.4_1: tatiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5:80.5.1_1: bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ bhikkhunīsikkhamānāsamaṇuddesehi saṁsaṭṭhā viharissanti.
an5:80.5.2_0: Bhikkhunīsikkhamānāsamaṇuddesehi saṁsagge kho pana, bhikkhave, sati etaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ:
an5:80.5.4_1: catutthaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5:80.6.1_1: bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ ārāmikasamaṇuddesehi saṁsaṭṭhā viharissanti.
an5:80.6.2_0: Ārāmikasamaṇuddesehi saṁsagge kho pana, bhikkhave, sati etaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ:
an5:80.6.4_1: pañcamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5:80.7.1_1: pañca anāgatabhayāni etarahi asamuppannāni āyatiṁ samuppajjissanti.
an5:81.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5:81.1.3_0: Rajanīye rajjati, dussanīye dussati, mohanīye muyhati, kuppanīye kuppati, madanīye majjati—
an5:81.1.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5:81.2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5:81.2.3_0: Rajanīye na rajjati, dussanīye na dussati, mohanīye na muyhati, kuppanīye na kuppati, madanīye na majjati—
an5:81.2.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5:82.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5:82.1.3_0: Avītarāgo hoti, avītadoso hoti, avītamoho hoti, makkhī ca, paḷāsī ca—
an5:82.1.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5:82.2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5:82.2.3_0: Vītarāgo hoti, vītadoso hoti, vītamoho hoti, amakkhī ca, apaḷāsī ca—
an5:82.2.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5:83.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5:83.1.3_0: Kuhako ca hoti, lapako ca, nemittiko ca, nippesiko ca, lābhena ca lābhaṁ nijigīsitā—
an5:83.1.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5:83.2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5:83.2.3_0: Na ca kuhako hoti, na ca lapako, na ca nemittiko, na ca nippesiko,
an5:83.2.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5:84.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti,
an5:84.1.1_2: amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5:84.1.3_0: Assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, kusīto hoti, duppañño hoti—
an5:84.1.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5:84.2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5:84.2.3_0: Saddho hoti, hirīmā hoti, ottappī hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti—
an5:84.2.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5:85.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5:85.1.3_0: Akkhamo hoti rūpānaṁ, akkhamo saddānaṁ, akkhamo gandhānaṁ, akkhamo rasānaṁ, akkhamo phoṭṭhabbānaṁ—
an5:85.1.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5:85.2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5:85.2.3_0: Khamo hoti rūpānaṁ, khamo saddānaṁ, khamo gandhānaṁ, khamo rasānaṁ, khamo phoṭṭhabbānaṁ—
an5:85.2.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5:86.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5:86.1.4_0: yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṁ uccāvacāni kiṅkaraṇīyāni tattha dakkho hoti analaso tatrupāyāya vīmaṁsāya samannāgato alaṁ kātuṁ alaṁ saṁvidhātuṁ—
an5:86.1.5_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5:87.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5:87.1.4_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5:87.1.4_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
an5:87.1.5_0: kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an5:87.1.6_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5:87.1.7_0: āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5:87.1.8_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5:88.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanaasukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an5:88.2.5_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5:88.2.5_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā appaṭividdhā;
an5:88.2.6_1: so bahujanaṁ saddhammā vuṭṭhāpetvā asaddhamme patiṭṭhāpeti.
an5:88.2.7_0: Thero bhikkhu rattaññū cirapabbajito itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti,
an5:88.2.7_1: ñāto thero bhikkhu yasassī sagahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṁ bahujanaparivāro itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti,
an5:88.2.7_2: lābhī thero bhikkhu cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti,
an5:88.2.7_3: bahussuto thero bhikkhu sutadharo sutasannicayo itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti.
an5:88.2.8_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanaasukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an5:88.3.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu bahujanahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an5:88.4.5_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5:88.4.5_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
an5:88.4.6_1: so bahujanaṁ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpetvā saddhamme patiṭṭhāpeti.
an5:88.4.7_0: Thero bhikkhu rattaññū cirapabbajito itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti,
an5:88.4.7_1: ñāto thero bhikkhu yasassī sagahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṁ bahujanaparivāro itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti,
an5:88.4.7_2: lābhī thero bhikkhu cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti,
an5:88.4.7_3: bahussuto thero bhikkhu sutadharo sutasannicayo itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti.
an5:88.4.8_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu bahujanahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan”ti.
an5:89.1.4_1: pañca dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5:89.2.3_0: Na kammārāmatā, na bhassārāmatā, na niddārāmatā, na saṅgaṇikārāmatā,
an5:89.2.4_1: pañca dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an5:90.1.3_1: sekho bhikkhu bahukicco hoti bahukaraṇīyo viyatto kiṅkaraṇīyesu;
an5:90.1.5_1: paṭhamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattati.
an5:90.2.1_1: sekho bhikkhu appamattakena kammena divasaṁ atināmeti;
an5:90.2.3_1: dutiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattati.
an5:90.3.1_1: sekho bhikkhu saṁsaṭṭho viharati gahaṭṭhapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisaṁsaggena;
an5:90.3.3_1: tatiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattati.
an5:90.4.1_1: sekho bhikkhu akālena gāmaṁ pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati;
an5:90.4.3_1: catuttho dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattati.
an5:90.5.1_1: sekho bhikkhu yāyaṁ kathā ābhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā, seyyathidaṁ—
an5:90.5.2_0: appicchakathā santuṭṭhikathā pavivekakathā asaṁsaggakathā vīriyārambhakathā sīlakathā samādhikathā paññākathā vimuttikathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā,
an5:90.5.2_1: evarūpiyā kathāya na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;
an5:90.5.4_1: pañcamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattati.
an5:90.5.5_1: pañca dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5:90.6.3_1: sekho bhikkhu na bahukicco hoti na bahukaraṇīyo viyatto kiṅkaraṇīyesu;

an5:94.1.3_1: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an5:94.1.4_0: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ … tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ … catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;

an5:95.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nacirasseva akuppaṁ paṭivijjhati.

an5:96.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu ānāpānassatiṁ āsevanto nacirasseva akuppaṁ paṭivijjhati.
an5:96.1.3_1: bhikkhu appaṭṭho hoti appakicco subharo susantoso jīvitaparikkhāresu;
an5:96.1.6_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5:96.1.6_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
an5:96.1.8_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu ānāpānassatiṁ āsevanto nacirasseva akuppaṁ paṭivijjhatī”ti.

an5:99.1.4_0: samantā catuddisaṁ anuviloketvā tikkhattuṁ sīhanādaṁ nadati;
an5:99.1.6_0: So hatthissa cepi pahāraṁ deti, sakkaccaññeva pahāraṁ deti, no asakkaccaṁ;
an5:99.1.7_0: mahiṁsassa cepi pahāraṁ deti, sakkaccaññeva pahāraṁ deti, no asakkaccaṁ;

an5:99.1.9_0: dīpissa cepi pahāraṁ deti, sakkaccaññeva pahāraṁ deti, no asakkaccaṁ;
an5:99.1.10_0: khuddakānañcepi pāṇānaṁ pahāraṁ deti antamaso sasabiḷārānampi, sakkaccaññeva pahāraṁ deti, no asakkaccaṁ.
an5:99.2.2_1: tathāgato parisāya dhammaṁ deseti, idamassa hoti sīhanādasmiṁ.
an5:99.2.3_1: sakkaccaññeva tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti, no asakkaccaṁ;

an5:100.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
an5:100.1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena kakudho nāma koliyaputto āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa upaṭṭhāko adhunākālaṅkato aññataraṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ upapanno.
an5:100.1.4_0: Tassa evarūpo attabhāvapaṭilābho hoti—seyyathāpi nāma dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakkhettāni.
an5:100.1.5_0: So tena attabhāvapaṭilābhena neva attānaṁ no paraṁ byābādheti.
an5:100.2.1_0: Atha kho kakudho devaputto yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
an5:100.2.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
an5:100.2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho kakudho devaputto āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca:
an5:100.2.6_0: Idaṁ vatvā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an5:100.3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5:100.3.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5:100.4.1_1: koliyaputto mamaṁ upaṭṭhāko adhunākālaṅkato aññataraṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ upapanno hoti.
an5:100.4.2_0: Tassa evarūpo attabhāvapaṭilābho—seyyathāpi nāma dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakkhettāni.
an5:100.4.3_0: So tena attabhāvapaṭilābhena neva attānaṁ no paraṁ byābādheti.
an5:100.4.4_2: upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho, bhante,
an5:100.4.9_0: Idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
an5:100.5.1_1: kakudho devaputto cetasā ceto paricca vidito:
an5:100.5.2_0: ‘yaṁ kiñci kakudho devaputto bhāsati sabbaṁ taṁ tatheva hoti, no aññathā’”ti?
an5:100.5.3_0: “Cetasā ceto paricca vidito me, bhante, kakudho devaputto:
an5:100.5.4_0: ‘yaṁ kiñci kakudho devaputto bhāsati sabbaṁ taṁ tatheva hoti, no aññathā’”ti.
an5:100.5.7_0: Idāni so moghapuriso attanāva attānaṁ pātukarissati.
an5:100.6.3_1: ekacco satthā aparisuddhasīlo samāno ‘parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṁ me sīlaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5:100.6.5_0: ‘ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ satthā aparisuddhasīlo samāno parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṁ me sīlaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5:100.6.6_0: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṁ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṁ.
an5:100.6.9_0: yaṁ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5:100.6.11_0: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi sīlato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsati.

an5:100.11.1_1: parisuddhasīlo samāno ‘parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhaṁ me sīlaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5:100.11.2_0: Na ca maṁ sāvakā sīlato rakkhanti,
an5:100.11.2_1: na cāhaṁ sāvakehi sīlato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsāmi.
an5:100.11.3_0: Parisuddhājīvo samāno ‘parisuddhājīvomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddho me ājīvo pariyodāto asaṅkiliṭṭho’ti.
an5:100.11.4_0: Na ca maṁ sāvakā ājīvato rakkhanti,
an5:100.11.4_1: na cāhaṁ sāvakehi ājīvato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsāmi.
an5:100.11.5_0: Parisuddhadhammadesano samāno ‘parisuddhadhammadesanomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhā me dhammadesanā pariyodātā asaṅkiliṭṭhā’ti.
an5:100.11.6_0: Na ca maṁ sāvakā dhammadesanato rakkhanti,
an5:100.11.6_1: na cāhaṁ sāvakehi dhammadesanato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsāmi.
an5:100.11.7_0: Parisuddhaveyyākaraṇo samāno ‘parisuddhaveyyākaraṇomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhaṁ me veyyākaraṇaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5:100.11.8_0: Na ca maṁ sāvakā veyyākaraṇato rakkhanti,
an5:100.11.8_1: na cāhaṁ sāvakehi veyyākaraṇato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsāmi.
an5:100.11.9_0: Parisuddhañāṇadassano samāno ‘parisuddhañāṇadassanomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhaṁ me ñāṇadassanaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5:100.11.10_0: Na ca maṁ sāvakā ñāṇadassanato rakkhanti,
an5:100.11.10_1: na cāhaṁ sāvakehi ñāṇadassanato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsāmī”ti.
an5:101.1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, sīlavā hoti, bahussuto hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti.
an5:102.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu ussaṅkitaparisaṅkito hoti pāpabhikkhūti api akuppadhammopi.
an5:102.2.2_1: bhikkhu vesiyāgocaro vā hoti, vidhavāgocaro vā hoti,
an5:102.2.2_2: thullakumārikāgocaro vā hoti, paṇḍakagocaro vā hoti, bhikkhunīgocaro vā hoti.
an5:102.3.1_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu ussaṅkitaparisaṅkito hoti pāpabhikkhūti api akuppadhammopī”ti.
an5:103.1.1_1: aṅgehi samannāgato mahācoro sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekāgārikampi karoti, paripanthepi tiṭṭhati.
an5:103.1.3_1: mahācoro visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca, balavanissito ca, bhogacāgī ca, ekacārī ca.
an5:103.2.2_1: mahācoro nadīviduggaṁ vā nissito hoti pabbatavisamaṁ vā.
an5:103.2.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro visamanissito hoti.
an5:103.3.2_1: mahācoro tiṇagahanaṁ vā nissito hoti rukkhagahanaṁ vā rodhaṁ vā mahāvanasaṇḍaṁ vā.
an5:103.3.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro gahananissito hoti.
an5:103.4.2_1: mahācoro rājānaṁ vā rājamahāmattānaṁ vā nissito hoti.
an5:103.4.4_1: ime me rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṁ bhaṇissantī’ti.
an5:103.4.5_1: tyassa rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṁ bhaṇanti.
an5:103.4.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro balavanissito hoti.
an5:103.5.5_0: Sace naṁ koci kiñci āha, tato bhogena paṭisantharati.
an5:103.5.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro bhogacāgī hoti.
an5:103.6.5_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro ekacārī hoti.
an5:103.7.1_1: pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato mahācoro sandhimpi chindati nillopampi harati ekāgārikampi karoti paripanthepi tiṭṭhati.
an5:103.8.1_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhu khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an5:103.8.1_2: sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo viññūnaṁ, bahuñca apuññaṁ pasavati.
an5:103.8.3_1: pāpabhikkhu visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca, balavanissito ca, bhogacāgī ca, ekacārī ca.
an5:103.10.2_1: pāpabhikkhu micchādiṭṭhiko hoti antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato.
an5:103.11.2_1: pāpabhikkhu rājānaṁ vā rājamahāmattānaṁ vā nissito hoti.
an5:103.11.4_1: ime me rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṁ bhaṇissantī’ti.
an5:103.11.5_1: tyassa rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṁ bhaṇanti.
an5:103.12.5_0: Sace naṁ koci kiñci āha, tato lābhena paṭisantharati.
an5:103.12.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu bhogacāgī hoti.
an5:103.13.2_1: pāpabhikkhu ekakova paccantimesu janapadesu nivāsaṁ kappeti.
an5:103.13.3_0: So tattha kulāni upasaṅkamanto lābhaṁ labhati.
an5:103.13.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu ekacārī hoti.
an5:103.14.1_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhu khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an5:103.14.1_2: sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo viññūnaṁ, bahuñca apuññaṁ pasavatī”ti.
an5:104.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo hoti.
an5:104.2.2_1: bhikkhu yācitova bahulaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjati, appaṁ ayācito;
an5:104.2.2_2: yācitova bahulaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paribhuñjati, appaṁ ayācito;
an5:104.2.2_3: yācitova bahulaṁ senāsanaṁ paribhuñjati, appaṁ ayācito;
an5:104.2.2_4: yācitova bahulaṁ gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ paribhuñjati, appaṁ ayācito.
an5:104.2.3_0: Yehi kho pana sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṁ viharati,
an5:104.2.3_1: tyassa manāpeneva bahulaṁ kāyakammena samudācaranti, appaṁ amanāpena;
an5:104.2.3_2: manāpeneva bahulaṁ vacīkammena samudācaranti, appaṁ amanāpena;
an5:104.2.3_3: manāpeneva bahulaṁ manokammena samudācaranti, appaṁ amanāpena;
an5:104.2.5_0: Yāni kho pana tāni vedayitāni pittasamuṭṭhānāni vā semhasamuṭṭhānāni vā vātasamuṭṭhānāni vā sannipātikāni vā utupariṇāmajāni vā visamaparihārajāni vā opakkamikāni vā kammavipākajāni vā,
an5:104.2.6_1: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an5:104.2.7_0: āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5:104.2.8_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo hoti.
an5:104.3.1_0: Yañhi taṁ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an5:104.3.1_1: ‘samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo’ti, mameva taṁ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya: ‘samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo’ti.
an5:104.3.2_1: yācitova bahulaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjāmi, appaṁ ayācito;
an5:104.3.2_2: yācitova bahulaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paribhuñjāmi, appaṁ ayācito;
an5:104.3.2_3: yācitova bahulaṁ senāsanaṁ paribhuñjāmi, appaṁ ayācito;
an5:104.3.2_4: yācitova bahulaṁ gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ paribhuñjāmi, appaṁ ayācito.
an5:104.3.3_0: Yehi kho pana bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ viharāmi,
an5:104.3.3_1: te maṁ manāpeneva bahulaṁ kāyakammena samudācaranti, appaṁ amanāpena;
an5:104.3.3_2: manāpeneva bahulaṁ vacīkammena samudācaranti, appaṁ amanāpena;
an5:104.3.3_3: manāpeneva bahulaṁ manokammena samudācaranti, appaṁ amanāpena;
an5:104.3.5_0: Yāni kho pana tāni vedayitāni—pittasamuṭṭhānāni vā semhasamuṭṭhānāni vā vātasamuṭṭhānāni vā sannipātikāni vā utupariṇāmajāni vā visamaparihārajāni vā opakkamikāni vā kammavipākajāni vā—tāni me na bahudeva uppajjanti. Appābādhohamasmi.
an5:104.3.6_0: catunnaṁ kho panasmi jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an5:104.4.1_0: Yañhi taṁ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an5:104.4.1_1: ‘samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo’ti, mameva taṁ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an5:105.1.3_1: bhikkhuno mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca,
an5:105.1.3_2: mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ … mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca.
an5:105.1.4_0: Yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṁvattanikāni,
an5:105.1.4_1: tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca.
an5:105.1.5_0: Yāyaṁ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya,
an5:105.1.5_1: tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca.
an5:106.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
an5:106.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5:106.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5:106.2.2_1: bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5:106.3.1_1: aññopi pariyāyo yathā bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti?
an5:106.3.3_1: bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5:106.4.1_1: aññopi pariyāyo yathā bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti?
an5:106.4.3_1: bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5:106.5.1_1: aññopi pariyāyo yathā bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti?
an5:106.5.3_1: bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5:106.5.6_0: catunnañca jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5:106.6.1_1: aññopi pariyāyo yathā bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti?
an5:106.6.3_1: bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5:106.6.6_0: catunnañca jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5:106.6.7_0: āsavānañca khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati;
an5:106.7.1_1: phāsuvihārā añño phāsuvihāro uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthīti vadāmī”ti.
an5:107.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an5:107.2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlasampanno hoti, samādhisampanno hoti, paññāsampanno hoti, vimuttisampanno hoti,
an5:107.3.1_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.
an5:108.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an5:108.2.3_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.
an5:109.1.3_1: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
an5:109.1.4_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5:109.1.4_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
an5:109.1.6_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5:109.1.7_0: āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5:109.1.8_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu cātuddiso hotī”ti.
an5:110.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṁ.
an5:110.1.3_1: bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
an5:110.1.5_0: āraddhavīriyo viharati thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu;
an5:110.1.6_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5:110.1.7_0: āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5:110.1.8_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevitun”ti.
an5:111.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato kulūpako bhikkhu kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5:111.1.3_0: Asanthavavissāsī ca hoti, anissaravikappī ca, vissaṭṭhupasevī ca, upakaṇṇakajappī ca, atiyācanako ca.
an5:111.1.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato kulūpako bhikkhu kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5:111.2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato kulūpako bhikkhu kulesu piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5:111.2.3_0: Na asanthavavissāsī ca hoti, na anissaravikappī ca, na vissaṭṭhupasevī ca, na upakaṇṇakajappī ca, na atiyācanako ca.
an5:111.2.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato kulūpako bhikkhu kulesu piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5:112.1.3_3: bhaṇamānassa antarantarā kathaṁ opāteti, duppañño hoti jaḷo eḷamūgo.
an5:112.1.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato pacchāsamaṇo na ādātabbo.
an5:112.2.3_0: Nātidūre gacchati na accāsanne, pattapariyāpannaṁ gaṇhati,
an5:112.2.3_2: bhaṇamānassa na antarantarā kathaṁ opāteti, paññavā hoti ajaḷo aneḷamūgo.
an5:113.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo sammāsamādhiṁ upasampajja viharituṁ.
an5:113.1.3_1: bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rūpānaṁ, akkhamo saddānaṁ, akkhamo gandhānaṁ, akkhamo rasānaṁ, akkhamo phoṭṭhabbānaṁ.
an5:113.1.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo sammāsamādhiṁ upasampajja viharituṁ.
an5:113.2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo sammāsamādhiṁ upasampajja viharituṁ.
an5:113.2.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti rūpānaṁ, khamo saddānaṁ, khamo gandhānaṁ, khamo rasānaṁ, khamo phoṭṭhabbānaṁ.
an5:113.2.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo sammāsamādhiṁ upasampajja viharitun”ti.
an5:114.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā magadhesu viharati andhakavinde.
an5:114.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5:114.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an5:114.2.1_1: bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, te vo, ānanda,
an5:114.2.1_2: bhikkhū pañcasu dhammesu samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
an5:114.2.3_1: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvutā viharatha ācāragocarasampannā aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvino,
an5:114.2.3_2: samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesū’ti—iti pātimokkhasaṁvare samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
an5:114.3.1_2: sārakkhitamānasā satārakkhena cetasā samannāgatā’ti—iti indriyasaṁvare samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
an5:114.4.1_1: bhasse pariyantakārino’ti—iti bhassapariyante samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
an5:114.5.1_1: araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevathā’ti—iti kāyavūpakāse samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
an5:114.6.1_1: sammādiṭṭhikā hotha sammādassanena samannāgatā’ti—iti sammādassane samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
an5:114.6.2_1: bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, te vo, ānanda,
an5:114.6.2_2: bhikkhū imesu pañcasu dhammesu samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā”ti.
an5:115.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṁ nikkhittā evaṁ niraye.
an5:115.1.3_0: Āvāsamaccharinī hoti, kulamaccharinī hoti, lābhamaccharinī hoti, vaṇṇamaccharinī hoti, dhammamaccharinī hoti.
an5:115.1.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṁ nikkhittā evaṁ niraye.
an5:115.2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṁ nikkhittā evaṁ sagge.
an5:115.2.3_0: Na āvāsamaccharinī hoti, na kulamaccharinī hoti, na lābhamaccharinī hoti, na vaṇṇamaccharinī hoti, na dhammamaccharinī hoti.
an5:115.2.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṁ nikkhittā evaṁ sagge”ti.

an5:121.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an5:121.1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena gilānasālā tenupasaṅkami.
an5:121.1.3_0: Addasā kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ dubbalaṁ gilānakaṁ;
an5:121.2.1_1: bhikkhuṁ dubbalaṁ gilānakaṁ pañca dhammā na vijahanti, tassetaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ:
an5:121.2.2_0: ‘nacirasseva āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissatī’ti.
an5:121.3.2_1: bhikkhu asubhānupassī kāye viharati, āhāre paṭikūlasaññī, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññī,
an5:121.3.2_3: maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an5:121.3.3_1: bhikkhuṁ dubbalaṁ gilānakaṁ ime pañca dhammā na vijahanti, tassetaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ:
an5:122.1.1_1: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā pañca dhamme bhāveti pañca dhamme bahulīkaroti,
an5:122.1.1_2: tassa dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—
an5:122.1.2_0: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā.
an5:122.2.2_1: bhikkhuno ajjhattaññeva sati sūpaṭṭhitā hoti dhammānaṁ udayatthagāminiyā paññāya, asubhānupassī kāye viharati, āhāre paṭikūlasaññī, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññī,
an5:122.2.3_1: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā ime pañca dhamme bhāveti ime pañca dhamme bahulīkaroti,
an5:122.2.3_2: tassa dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—
an5:123.1.3_0: Asappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṁ na jānāti,
an5:123.1.3_2: atthakāmassa gilānupaṭṭhākassa na yathābhūtaṁ ābādhaṁ āvikattā hoti abhikkamantaṁ vā abhikkamatīti paṭikkamantaṁ vā paṭikkamatīti ṭhitaṁ vā ṭhitoti,
an5:123.1.3_3: uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ anadhivāsakajātiko hoti.
an5:123.1.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato gilāno dūpaṭṭhāko hoti.
an5:123.2.3_0: Sappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṁ jānāti, bhesajjaṁ paṭisevitā hoti,
an5:123.2.3_1: atthakāmassa gilānupaṭṭhākassa yathābhūtaṁ ābādhaṁ āvikattā hoti abhikkamantaṁ vā abhikkamatīti paṭikkamantaṁ vā paṭikkamatīti ṭhitaṁ vā ṭhitoti,
an5:123.2.3_2: uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
an5:123.2.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato gilāno sūpaṭṭhāko hotī”ti.
an5:124.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko nālaṁ gilānaṁ upaṭṭhātuṁ.
an5:124.1.4_0: sappāyāsappāyaṁ na jānāti, asappāyaṁ upanāmeti, sappāyaṁ apanāmeti;
an5:124.1.6_0: jegucchī hoti uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā vantaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā nīharituṁ;
an5:124.1.7_0: nappaṭibalo hoti gilānaṁ kālena kālaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṁ samādapetuṁ samuttejetuṁ sampahaṁsetuṁ.
an5:124.1.8_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko nālaṁ gilānaṁ upaṭṭhātuṁ.
an5:124.2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko alaṁ gilānaṁ upaṭṭhātuṁ.
an5:124.2.4_0: sappāyāsappāyaṁ jānāti, asappāyaṁ apanāmeti, sappāyaṁ upanāmeti;
an5:124.2.6_0: ajegucchī hoti uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā vantaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā nīharituṁ;
an5:124.2.7_0: paṭibalo hoti gilānaṁ kālena kālaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṁ samādapetuṁ samuttejetuṁ sampahaṁsetuṁ.
an5:124.2.8_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko alaṁ gilānaṁ upaṭṭhātun”ti.
an5:125.1.3_0: Asappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṁ na jānāti, apariṇatabhojī ca hoti, akālacārī ca hoti, abrahmacārī ca.
an5:125.1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā anāyussā.
an5:125.2.3_0: Sappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṁ jānāti, pariṇatabhojī ca hoti, kālacārī ca hoti, brahmacārī ca.
an5:125.2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā āyussā”ti.
an5:126.1.3_0: Asappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṁ na jānāti, apariṇatabhojī ca hoti, dussīlo ca, pāpamitto ca.
an5:126.1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā anāyussā.

an5:126.2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā āyussā”ti.
an5:127.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nālaṁ saṅghamhā vapakāsituṁ.
an5:127.1.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nālaṁ saṅghamhā vapakāsituṁ.
an5:127.2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ saṅghamhā vapakāsituṁ.
an5:127.2.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ saṅghamhā vapakāsitun”ti.
an5:129.1.3_0: Mātā jīvitā voropitā hoti, pitā jīvitā voropito hoti, arahaṁ jīvitā voropito hoti,
an5:129.1.3_1: tathāgatassa duṭṭhena cittena lohitaṁ uppāditaṁ hoti, saṅgho bhinno hoti.
an5:130.1.4_1: sattā ñātibyasanahetu vā bhogabyasanahetu vā rogabyasanahetu vā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti.
an5:130.1.5_1: sattā diṭṭhibyasanahetu vā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti.
an5:130.2.4_1: sattā ñātisampadāhetu vā bhogasampadāhetu vā ārogyasampadāhetu vā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
an5:130.2.5_1: sattā diṭṭhisampadāhetu vā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
an5:131.1.1_1: aṅgehi samannāgato rājā cakkavattī dhammeneva cakkaṁ vatteti;
an5:131.1.2_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā.
an5:131.2.2_1: rājā cakkavattī atthaññū ca hoti, dhammaññū ca, mattaññū ca, kālaññū ca, parisaññū ca.
an5:131.2.3_1: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rājā cakkavattī dhammeneva cakkaṁ pavatteti;
an5:131.2.4_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā.
an5:131.3.1_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammeneva anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavatteti;
an5:131.3.2_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
an5:131.4.2_1: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho atthaññū, dhammaññū, mattaññū, kālaññū, parisaññū.
an5:131.4.3_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammeneva anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavatteti;
an5:131.4.4_0: taṁ hoti dhammacakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
an5:132.1.1_1: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño cakkavattissa jeṭṭho putto pitarā pavattitaṁ cakkaṁ dhammeneva anuppavatteti;
an5:132.1.2_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā.
an5:132.2.2_1: rañño cakkavattissa jeṭṭho putto atthaññū ca hoti, dhammaññū ca, mattaññū ca, kālaññū ca, parisaññū ca.
an5:132.2.3_1: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño cakkavattissa jeṭṭho putto pitarā pavattitaṁ cakkaṁ dhammeneva anuppavatteti;
an5:132.2.4_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā.
an5:132.3.1_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato sāriputto tathāgatena anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ sammadeva anuppavatteti;
an5:132.3.2_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
an5:132.4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, sāriputto atthaññū, dhammaññū, mattaññū, kālaññū, parisaññū.
an5:132.4.3_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato sāriputto tathāgatena anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ sammadeva anuppavatteti;
an5:132.4.4_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
an5:133.1.2_0: Evaṁ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5:133.2.1_1: rājā cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaññeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahati antojanasmiṁ.
an5:133.3.1_1: rājā cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaññeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahati khattiyesu anuyantesu …pe… balakāyasmiṁ brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamajānapadesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu migapakkhīsu.
an5:133.3.2_1: rājā cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaññeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahitvā antojanasmiṁ dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahitvā khattiyesu anuyantesu balakāyasmiṁ brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamajānapadesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu migapakkhīsu dhammeneva cakkaṁ pavatteti;
an5:133.3.3_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā.
an5:133.4.1_1: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaññeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahati bhikkhūsu:
an5:133.4.5_0: evarūpo ājīvo sevitabbo, evarūpo ājīvo na sevitabbo;
an5:133.5.1_1: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaññeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahati bhikkhunīsu …pe… upāsakesu …pe… upāsikāsu:
an5:133.5.5_0: evarūpo ājīvo sevitabbo, evarūpo ājīvo na sevitabbo;
an5:133.6.1_1: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaññeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahitvā bhikkhūsu,
an5:133.6.1_4: dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahitvā upāsikāsu dhammeneva anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavatteti;
an5:133.6.2_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
an5:134.1.1_1: aṅgehi samannāgato rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto yassaṁ yassaṁ disāyaṁ viharati, sakasmiṁyeva vijite viharati.
an5:134.2.2_1: rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto ubhato sujāto hoti mātito ca pitito ca, saṁsuddhagahaṇiko,
an5:134.2.2_2: yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena;
an5:134.2.4_0: balavā kho pana hoti caturaṅginiyā senāya samannāgato assavāya ovādapaṭikarāya;
an5:134.2.5_0: pariṇāyako kho panassa hoti paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī paṭibalo atītānāgatapaccuppanne atthe cintetuṁ;
an5:134.2.7_0: So iminā yasapañcamena dhammena samannāgato yassaṁ yassaṁ disāyaṁ viharati, sakasmiṁyeva vijite viharati.
an5:134.3.1_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yassaṁ yassaṁ disāyaṁ viharati, vimuttacittova viharati.
an5:134.3.3_1: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
an5:134.3.5_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5:134.3.5_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā—
an5:134.3.6_0: rājāva khattiyo muddhāvasitto aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo paripuṇṇakosakoṭṭhāgāro;
an5:134.3.7_0: āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāya thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu—
an5:134.3.9_0: paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā—
an5:134.3.12_0: So iminā vimuttipañcamena dhammena samannāgato yassaṁ yassaṁ disāyaṁ viharati vimuttacittova viharati.
an5:135.1.1_1: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto rajjaṁ pattheti.
an5:135.1.3_1: rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto ubhato sujāto hoti mātito ca pitito ca, saṁsuddhagahaṇiko,
an5:135.1.3_2: yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena;
an5:135.1.4_0: abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato;
an5:135.1.7_0: yāni tāni raññaṁ khattiyānaṁ muddhāvasittānaṁ sippaṭṭhānāni hatthismiṁ vā assasmiṁ vā rathasmiṁ vā dhanusmiṁ vā tharusmiṁ vā tattha sikkhito hoti anavayo.
an5:135.2.2_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca, saṁsuddhagahaṇiko,
an5:135.2.2_1: yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena.
an5:135.2.4_0: Ahaṁ khomhi abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato.
an5:135.2.10_0: Ahaṁ khomhi yāni tāni raññaṁ khattiyānaṁ muddhāvasittānaṁ sippaṭṭhānāni hatthismiṁ vā assasmiṁ vā rathasmiṁ vā dhanusmiṁ vā tharusmiṁ vā, tattha sikkhito anavayo.
an5:135.2.12_1: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto rajjaṁ pattheti.
an5:135.3.1_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pattheti.
an5:135.3.4_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an5:135.3.5_1: samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato nātisītāya nāccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya;
an5:135.3.6_1: yathābhūtaṁ attānaṁ āvikattā satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu;
an5:135.3.8_0: paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an5:135.4.3_0: “itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā”ti.
an5:135.4.5_0: Ahaṁ khomhi appābādho appātaṅko samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato nātisītāya nāccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya.
an5:135.4.7_0: Ahaṁ khomhi asaṭho amāyāvī yathābhūtaṁ attānaṁ āvikattā satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu.
an5:135.4.9_0: Ahaṁ khomhi āraddhavīriyo viharāmi akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya,
an5:135.4.11_0: Ahaṁ khomhi paññavā udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an5:135.4.13_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ patthetī”ti.
