an5:193.7.2_1: udapatto asaṁsaṭṭho lākhāya vā haliddiyā vā nīliyā vā mañjiṭṭhāya vā.
an5:193.7.3_0: Tattha cakkhumā puriso sakaṁ mukhanimittaṁ paccavekkhamāno yathābhūtaṁ pajāneyya passeyya.
an5:193.7.4_1: yasmiṁ samaye na kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati …pe….
an5:193.8.1_1: yasmiṁ samaye na byāpādapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati …pe…
an5:193.8.3_0: Tattha cakkhumā puriso sakaṁ mukhanimittaṁ paccavekkhamāno yathābhūtaṁ pajāneyya passeyya.
an5:193.8.4_1: yasmiṁ samaye na byāpādapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati …pe….
an5:193.9.1_1: yasmiṁ samaye na thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati …pe…
an5:193.9.3_0: Tattha cakkhumā puriso sakaṁ mukhanimittaṁ paccavekkhamāno yathābhūtaṁ pajāneyya passeyya.
an5:193.9.4_1: yasmiṁ samaye na thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati …pe….
an5:193.10.1_1: yasmiṁ samaye na uddhaccakukkuccapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati …pe…
an5:193.10.2_1: udapatto na vāterito na calito na bhanto na ūmijāto.
an5:193.10.3_0: Tattha cakkhumā puriso sakaṁ mukhanimittaṁ paccavekkhamāno yathābhūtaṁ pajāneyya passeyya.
an5:193.10.4_1: yasmiṁ samaye na uddhaccakukkuccapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati …pe….
an5:193.11.1_1: yasmiṁ samaye na vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na vicikicchāparetena,
an5:193.11.1_2: uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti,
an5:193.11.1_3: attatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti passati,
an5:193.11.1_4: paratthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti passati,
an5:193.11.1_5: ubhayatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti passati,
an5:193.11.1_6: dīgharattaṁ asajjhāyakatāpi mantā paṭibhanti, pageva sajjhāyakatā.
an5:193.11.2_1: udapatto accho vippasanno anāvilo āloke nikkhitto.
an5:193.11.3_0: Tattha cakkhumā puriso sakaṁ mukhanimittaṁ paccavekkhamāno yathābhūtaṁ pajāneyya passeyya.
an5:193.11.4_1: yasmiṁ samaye na vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na vicikicchāparetena,
an5:193.11.4_2: uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti,
an5:193.11.4_3: attatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti passati,
an5:193.11.4_4: paratthampi …pe… ubhayatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti passati,
an5:193.11.4_5: dīgharattaṁ asajjhāyakatāpi mantā paṭibhanti, pageva sajjhāyakatā.
an5:193.12.1_0: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, hetu ayaṁ paccayo,
an5:193.12.1_1: yena kadāci dīgharattaṁ sajjhāyakatāpi mantā nappaṭibhanti, pageva asajjhāyakatā.
an5:193.12.2_0: Ayaṁ pana, brāhmaṇa, hetu ayaṁ paccayo,
an5:193.12.2_1: yena kadāci dīgharattaṁ asajjhāyakatāpi mantā paṭibhanti, pageva sajjhāyakatā”ti.
an5:193.13.1_1: bho gotama …pe… upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an5:194.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an5:194.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena kāraṇapālī brāhmaṇo licchavīnaṁ kammantaṁ kāreti.
an5:194.1.3_0: Addasā kho kāraṇapālī brāhmaṇo piṅgiyāniṁ brāhmaṇaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ;
an5:194.2.1_0: “Handa kuto nu bhavaṁ piṅgiyānī āgacchati divā divassā”ti?
an5:194.2.3_0: “Taṁ kiṁ maññati bhavaṁ piṅgiyānī samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṁ? Paṇḍito maññe”ti?
an5:194.2.4_1: ko ca samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṁ jānissāmi.
an5:194.2.5_0: Sopi nūnassa tādisova yo samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṁ jāneyyā”ti.
an5:194.2.6_0: “Uḷārāya khalu bhavaṁ piṅgiyānī samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ pasaṁsāya pasaṁsatī”ti.
an5:194.2.8_0: Pasatthappasatthova so bhavaṁ gotamo seṭṭho devamanussānan”ti.
an5:194.2.9_0: “Kiṁ pana bhavaṁ piṅgiyānī atthavasaṁ sampassamāno samaṇe gotame evaṁ abhippasanno”ti?
an5:194.3.1_1: puriso aggarasaparititto na aññesaṁ hīnānaṁ rasānaṁ piheti;
an5:194.3.2_1: yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṁ suṇāti—
an5:194.3.3_0: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5:194.3.4_0: tato tato na aññesaṁ puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇappavādānaṁ piheti.
an5:194.4.3_1: yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṁ suṇāti—
an5:194.4.4_0: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5:194.4.5_0: tato tato labhateva attamanataṁ, labhati cetaso pasādaṁ.
an5:194.5.4_0: yadi mūlato, yadi majjhato, yadi aggato—
an5:194.5.6_1: yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṁ suṇāti—
an5:194.5.7_0: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5:194.5.8_0: tato tato adhigacchati pāmojjaṁ adhigacchati somanassaṁ.
an5:194.6.2_0: Tassa kusalo bhisakko ṭhānaso ābādhaṁ nīhareyya;
an5:194.6.3_1: yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṁ suṇāti—
an5:194.6.4_0: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5:194.7.1_1: pokkharaṇī acchodakā sātodakā sītodakā setakā supatitthā ramaṇīyā.
an5:194.7.2_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito.
an5:194.7.3_0: So taṁ pokkharaṇiṁ ogāhetvā nhātvā ca pivitvā ca sabbadarathakilamathapariḷāhaṁ paṭippassambheyya.
an5:194.7.4_1: yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṁ suṇāti—
an5:194.7.5_0: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5:194.8.1_1: kāraṇapālī brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā dakkhiṇaṁ jāṇumaṇḍalaṁ pathaviyaṁ nihantvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā tikkhattuṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
an5:194.12.1_0: Abhikkantaṁ, bho piṅgiyāni, abhikkantaṁ, bho piṅgiyāni.
an5:194.12.2_1: nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya,
an5:194.12.2_2: mūḷhassa vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya:
an5:194.12.2_4: evamevaṁ bhotā piṅgiyāninā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
an5:194.12.3_1: taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
an5:195.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an5:195.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena pañcamattāni licchavisatāni bhagavantaṁ payirupāsanti.
an5:195.1.3_0: Appekacce licchavī nīlā honti nīlavaṇṇā nīlavatthā nīlālaṅkārā,
an5:195.1.3_1: appekacce licchavī pītā honti pītavaṇṇā pītavatthā pītālaṅkārā,
an5:195.1.3_2: appekacce licchavī lohitakā honti lohitakavaṇṇā lohitakavatthā lohitakālaṅkārā,
an5:195.1.3_3: appekacce licchavī odātā honti odātavaṇṇā odātavatthā odātālaṅkārā.
an5:195.1.4_0: Tyassudaṁ bhagavā atirocati vaṇṇena ceva yasasā ca.
an5:195.2.1_0: Atha kho piṅgiyānī brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5:195.2.4_0: Atha kho piṅgiyānī brāhmaṇo bhagavato sammukhā sāruppāya gāthāya abhitthavi:
an5:195.4.1_0: Atha kho te licchavī pañcahi uttarāsaṅgasatehi piṅgiyāniṁ brāhmaṇaṁ acchādesuṁ.
an5:195.4.2_0: Atha kho piṅgiyānī brāhmaṇo tehi pañcahi uttarāsaṅgasatehi bhagavantaṁ acchādesi.
an5:195.5.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā te licchavī etadavoca:
an5:195.5.4_0: Tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṁ.
an5:195.5.5_0: Tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desetā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṁ.
an5:195.5.6_0: Tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa viññātā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṁ.
an5:195.5.7_0: Tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa viññātā dhammānudhammappaṭipanno puggalo dullabho lokasmiṁ.
an5:196.1.1_1: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato pañca mahāsupinā pāturahesuṁ.
an5:196.1.3_1: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ mahāpathavī mahāsayanaṁ ahosi,
an5:196.1.3_3: puratthime samudde vāmo hattho ohito ahosi,
an5:196.1.3_4: pacchime samudde dakkhiṇo hattho ohito ahosi,
an5:196.1.3_5: dakkhiṇe samudde ubho pādā ohitā ahesuṁ.
an5:196.1.4_1: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ paṭhamo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.2.1_1: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato tiriyā nāma tiṇajāti nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṁ āhacca ṭhitā ahosi.
an5:196.2.2_1: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ dutiyo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.3.1_1: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato setā kimī kaṇhasīsā pādehi ussakkitvā (…) yāva jāṇumaṇḍalā paṭicchādesuṁ.
an5:196.3.2_1: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ tatiyo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.4.1_1: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato cattāro sakuṇā nānāvaṇṇā catūhi disāhi āgantvā pādamūle nipatitvā sabbasetā sampajjiṁsu.
an5:196.4.2_1: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ catuttho mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.5.1_1: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno mahato mīḷhapabbatassa uparūpari caṅkamati alippamāno mīḷhena.
an5:196.5.2_1: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ pañcamo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.6.1_1: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ mahāpathavī mahāsayanaṁ ahosi,
an5:196.6.1_3: puratthime samudde vāmo hattho ohito ahosi,
an5:196.6.1_4: pacchime samudde dakkhiṇo hattho ohito ahosi,
an5:196.6.1_5: dakkhiṇe samudde ubho pādā ohitā ahesuṁ;
an5:196.6.3_0: Tassā abhisambodhāya ayaṁ paṭhamo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.7.1_1: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato tiriyā nāma tiṇajāti nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṁ āhacca ṭhitā ahosi;
an5:196.7.2_1: arahatā sammāsambuddhena ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo abhisambujjhitvā yāva devamanussehi suppakāsito.
an5:196.7.3_0: Tassa abhisambodhāya ayaṁ dutiyo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.8.1_1: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato setā kimī kaṇhasīsā pādehi ussakkitvā yāva jāṇumaṇḍalā paṭicchādesuṁ;
an5:196.8.2_1: gihī odātavasanā tathāgataṁ pāṇupetā saraṇaṁ gatā.
an5:196.8.3_0: Tassa abhisambodhāya ayaṁ tatiyo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.9.1_1: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato cattāro sakuṇā nānāvaṇṇā catūhi disāhi āgantvā pādamūle nipatitvā sabbasetā sampajjiṁsu;
an5:196.9.2_1: vaṇṇā khattiyā brāhmaṇā vessā suddā te tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitvā anuttaraṁ vimuttiṁ sacchikaronti.
an5:196.9.3_0: Tassa abhisambodhāya ayaṁ catuttho mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.10.1_1: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno mahato mīḷhapabbatassa uparūpari caṅkamati alippamāno mīḷhena;
an5:196.10.2_2: taṁ tathāgato agathito amucchito anajjhosanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati.
an5:196.10.3_0: Tassa abhisambodhāya ayaṁ pañcamo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.11.1_1: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ime pañca mahāsupinā pāturahesun”ti.
an5:197.1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, vassassa antarāyā, yaṁ nemittā na jānanti,
an5:197.1.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo vassassa antarāyo, yaṁ nemittā na jānanti,
an5:197.2.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo vassassa antarāyo, yaṁ nemittā na jānanti,
an5:197.3.1_1: rāhu asurindo pāṇinā udakaṁ sampaṭicchitvā mahāsamudde chaḍḍeti.
an5:197.3.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo vassassa antarāyo, yaṁ nemittā na jānanti,
an5:197.4.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho vassassa antarāyo, yaṁ nemittā na jānanti,
an5:197.5.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, manussā adhammikā honti.
an5:197.5.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamo vassassa antarāyo, yaṁ nemittā na jānanti,
an5:197.5.3_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca vassassa antarāyā, yaṁ nemittā na jānanti,
an5:198.1.1_1: aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā,
an5:198.1.3_0: Kālena ca bhāsitā hoti, saccā ca bhāsitā hoti, saṇhā ca bhāsitā hoti,
an5:198.1.3_1: atthasaṁhitā ca bhāsitā hoti, mettacittena ca bhāsitā hoti.
an5:198.1.4_1: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā,
an5:199.1.1_2: tattha manussā pañcahi ṭhānehi bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavanti.
an5:199.1.3_1: samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṁ upasaṅkamante manussā disvā cittāni pasādenti, saggasaṁvattanikaṁ, bhikkhave,
an5:199.1.3_2: taṁ kulaṁ tasmiṁ samaye paṭipadaṁ paṭipannaṁ hoti.
an5:199.2.1_1: samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṁ upasaṅkamante manussā paccuṭṭhenti abhivādenti āsanaṁ denti, uccākulīnasaṁvattanikaṁ, bhikkhave,
an5:199.2.1_2: taṁ kulaṁ tasmiṁ samaye paṭipadaṁ paṭipannaṁ hoti.
an5:199.3.1_1: samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṁ upasaṅkamante manussā maccheramalaṁ paṭivinenti, mahesakkhasaṁvattanikaṁ, bhikkhave,
an5:199.3.1_2: taṁ kulaṁ tasmiṁ samaye paṭipadaṁ paṭipannaṁ hoti.
an5:199.4.1_1: samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṁ upasaṅkamante manussā yathāsatti yathābalaṁ saṁvibhajanti, mahābhogasaṁvattanikaṁ, bhikkhave,
an5:199.4.1_2: taṁ kulaṁ tasmiṁ samaye paṭipadaṁ paṭipannaṁ hoti.
an5:199.5.1_1: samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṁ upasaṅkamante manussā paripucchanti paripañhanti dhammaṁ suṇanti, mahāpaññāsaṁvattanikaṁ, bhikkhave,
an5:199.5.1_2: taṁ kulaṁ tasmiṁ samaye paṭipadaṁ paṭipannaṁ hoti.
an5:199.5.2_2: tattha manussā imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavantī”ti.
an5:200.1.3_1: bhikkhuno kāmaṁ manasikaroto kāmesu cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5:200.1.4_0: Nekkhammaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto nekkhamme cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5:200.1.5_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ suvisaṁyuttaṁ kāmehi;
an5:200.1.6_0: ye ca kāmapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṁ vedanaṁ vediyati.
an5:200.2.1_1: bhikkhuno byāpādaṁ manasikaroto byāpāde cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5:200.2.2_0: Abyāpādaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto abyāpāde cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5:200.2.3_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ suvisaṁyuttaṁ byāpādena;
an5:200.2.4_0: ye ca byāpādapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṁ vedanaṁ vediyati.
an5:200.3.1_1: bhikkhuno vihesaṁ manasikaroto vihesāya cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5:200.3.2_0: Avihesaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto avihesāya cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5:200.3.3_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ suvisaṁyuttaṁ vihesāya;
an5:200.3.4_0: ye ca vihesāpaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṁ vedanaṁ vediyati.
an5:200.4.1_1: bhikkhuno rūpaṁ manasikaroto rūpe cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5:200.4.2_0: Arūpaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto arūpe cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5:200.4.3_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ suvisaṁyuttaṁ rūpehi;
an5:200.4.4_0: ye ca rūpapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṁ vedanaṁ vediyati.
an5:200.5.1_1: bhikkhuno sakkāyaṁ manasikaroto sakkāye cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5:200.5.2_0: Sakkāyanirodhaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto sakkāyanirodhe cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5:200.5.3_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ suvisaṁyuttaṁ sakkāyena;
an5:200.5.4_0: ye ca sakkāyapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṁ vedanaṁ vediyati.
an5:200.6.1_0: Tassa kāmanandīpi nānuseti, byāpādanandīpi nānuseti, vihesānandīpi nānuseti, rūpanandīpi nānuseti,
an5:200.6.1_1: sakkāyanandīpi nānuseti so kāmanandiyāpi ananusayā, byāpādanandiyāpi ananusayā, vihesānandiyāpi ananusayā, rūpanandiyāpi ananusayā, sakkāyanandiyāpi ananusayā.
an5:200.6.2_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niranusayo, acchecchi taṇhaṁ, vivattayi saṁyojanaṁ,
an5:200.6.3_0: Imā kho, bhikkhave, pañca nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo”ti.
an5:201.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kimilāyaṁ viharati veḷuvane.
an5:201.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā kimilo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5:201.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā kimilo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5:201.1.3_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo,
an5:201.1.3_1: yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti?
an5:201.1.4_1: tathāgate parinibbute bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo satthari agāravā viharanti appatissā,
an5:201.1.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, kimila, hetu ayaṁ paccayo,
an5:201.1.5_1: yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti.
an5:201.2.1_1: yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti?
an5:201.2.2_1: tathāgate parinibbute bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo satthari sagāravā viharanti sappatissā,
an5:201.2.3_0: Ayaṁ kho, kimila, hetu ayaṁ paccayo,
an5:201.2.3_1: yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti.
an5:202.1.3_0: Assutaṁ suṇāti, sutaṁ pariyodāpeti, kaṅkhaṁ vitarati, diṭṭhiṁ ujuṁ karoti, cittamassa pasīdati.
an5:203.1.1_1: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an5:203.2.3_1: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an5:203.2.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an5:203.3.3_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.
an5:205.1.3_1: bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati.
an5:205.1.4_1: bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati,
an5:205.1.4_2: tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an5:205.1.5_0: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṁ paṭhamo cetokhilo.
an5:205.2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme kaṅkhati …pe…
an5:205.2.4_0: sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto.
an5:205.2.5_1: bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto,
an5:205.2.5_2: tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an5:205.2.6_0: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṁ pañcamo cetokhilo.
an5:206.1.3_1: bhikkhu kāmesu avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
an5:206.1.4_1: bhikkhu kāmesu avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho,
an5:206.1.4_2: tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an5:206.1.5_0: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya,
an5:206.2.3_0: yāvadatthaṁ udarāvadehakaṁ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharati …pe…
an5:206.2.4_1: ‘imināhaṁ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti.
an5:206.2.5_1: bhikkhu aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṁ carati:
an5:206.2.5_2: ‘imināhaṁ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti,
an5:206.2.5_3: tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an5:206.2.6_0: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya,
an5:207.1.3_0: Khuddaṁ paṭihanati, pipāsaṁ paṭivineti, vātaṁ anulometi, vatthiṁ sodheti, āmāvasesaṁ pāceti.
an5:207.1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā yāguyā”ti.
an5:208.1.3_0: Acakkhussaṁ, mukhaṁ duggandhaṁ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo na visujjhanti,
an5:208.1.3_1: pittaṁ semhaṁ bhattaṁ pariyonandhati, bhattamassa nacchādeti.
an5:208.2.3_0: Cakkhussaṁ, mukhaṁ na duggandhaṁ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo visujjhanti,
an5:208.2.3_1: pittaṁ semhaṁ bhattaṁ na pariyonandhati, bhattamassa chādeti.
an5:209.1.3_1: parepi tasmiṁ sare sārajjanti, gahapatikāpi ujjhāyanti:
an5:209.1.5_1: pañca ādīnavā āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṁ bhaṇantassā”ti.
an5:210.1.3_0: Dukkhaṁ supati, dukkhaṁ paṭibujjhati, pāpakaṁ supinaṁ passati, devatā na rakkhanti, asuci muccati.
an5:210.1.4_1: pañca ādīnavā muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa niddaṁ okkamayato.
an5:210.2.3_0: Sukhaṁ supati, sukhaṁ paṭibujjhati, na pāpakaṁ supinaṁ passati, devatā rakkhanti, asuci na muccati.
an5:210.2.4_1: pañca ānisaṁsā upaṭṭhitassatissa sampajānassa niddaṁ okkamayato”ti.
an5:211.1.3_2: bāḷhaṁ vā rogātaṅkaṁ phusati, sammūḷho kālaṁ karoti,
an5:211.1.3_3: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an5:212.1.1_1: bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako,
an5:212.1.3_1: pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, sammūḷho kālaṁ karoti,
an5:212.1.3_2: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an5:212.1.4_1: bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako,
an5:213.1.3_1: dussīlo sīlavipanno pamādādhikaraṇaṁ mahatiṁ bhogajāniṁ nigacchati.
an5:213.3.1_1: dussīlo sīlavipanno yaññadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamati—yadi khattiyaparisaṁ, yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṁ, yadi gahapatiparisaṁ,
an5:213.5.1_1: dussīlo sīlavipanno kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an5:213.6.3_1: sīlavā sīlasampanno appamādādhikaraṇaṁ mahantaṁ bhogakkhandhaṁ adhigacchati.
an5:213.8.1_1: sīlavā sīlasampanno yaññadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamati—yadi khattiyaparisaṁ, yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṁ, yadi gahapatiparisaṁ,
an5:213.10.1_1: sīlavā sīlasampanno kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an5:214.1.3_0: Musā bhaṇati, pisuṇaṁ bhaṇati, pharusaṁ bhaṇati, samphappalāpaṁ bhaṇati,
an5:214.1.3_1: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an5:214.2.3_0: Na musā bhaṇati, na pisuṇaṁ bhaṇati, na pharusaṁ bhaṇati, na samphappalāpaṁ bhaṇati,
an5:214.2.3_1: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an5:215.1.3_0: Bahuno janassa appiyo hoti amanāpo, verabahulo ca hoti, vajjabahulo ca, sammūḷho kālaṁ karoti,
an5:215.1.3_1: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an5:215.1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā akkhantiyā.
an5:215.2.3_0: Bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo, na verabahulo hoti, na vajjabahulo, asammūḷho kālaṁ karoti,
an5:215.2.3_1: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an5:215.2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā khantiyā”ti.

an5:216.1.3_1: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.

an5:221.1.3_0: Assutaṁ na suṇāti, sutaṁ na pariyodāpeti,
an5:221.1.3_1: sutenekaccena avisārado hoti, gāḷhaṁ rogātaṅkaṁ phusati, na ca mittavā hoti.
an5:221.1.4_1: pañca ādīnavā dīghacārikaṁ anavatthacārikaṁ anuyuttassa viharato.
an5:221.2.3_0: Assutaṁ suṇāti, sutaṁ pariyodāpeti, sutenekaccena visārado hoti,
an5:221.2.3_1: na gāḷhaṁ rogātaṅkaṁ phusati, mittavā ca hoti.
an5:222.1.3_1: adhigatenekaccena avisārado hoti, gāḷhaṁ rogātaṅkaṁ phusati, na ca mittavā hoti.
an5:222.1.4_1: pañca ādīnavā dīghacārikaṁ anavatthacārikaṁ anuyuttassa viharato.
an5:222.2.3_2: na gāḷhaṁ rogātaṅkaṁ phusati, mittavā ca hoti.
an5:223.1.3_4: tamhā ca āvāsā pakkamanto sāpekkho pakkamati.
an5:223.1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā atinivāse.
an5:223.2.3_2: na bahukicco hoti na bahukaraṇīyo na byatto kiṅkaraṇīyesu,
an5:223.2.3_4: tamhā ca āvāsā pakkamanto anapekkho pakkamati.
an5:224.1.3_0: Āvāsamaccharī hoti, kulamaccharī hoti, lābhamaccharī hoti, vaṇṇamaccharī hoti, dhammamaccharī hoti.
an5:224.1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā atinivāse.
an5:224.2.3_0: Na āvāsamaccharī hoti, na kulamaccharī hoti, na lābhamaccharī hoti, na vaṇṇamaccharī hoti, na dhammamaccharī hoti.
an5:225.1.3_0: Anāmantacāre āpajjati, raho nisajjāya āpajjati, paṭicchanne āsane āpajjati,
an5:225.1.3_1: mātugāmassa uttari chappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ desento āpajjati, kāmasaṅkappabahulo viharati.
an5:225.1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā kulūpake”ti.
an5:226.1.1_1: ādīnavā kulūpakassa bhikkhuno ativelaṁ kulesu saṁsaṭṭhassa viharato.
an5:226.1.7_1: ‘anabhirato vā brahmacariyaṁ carissati aññataraṁ vā saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjissati sikkhaṁ vā paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissati’.
an5:226.1.8_1: pañca ādīnavā kulūpakassa bhikkhuno ativelaṁ kulesu saṁsaṭṭhassa viharato”ti.
an5:227.1.3_0: Aggisādhāraṇā bhogā, udakasādhāraṇā bhogā, rājasādhāraṇā bhogā, corasādhāraṇā bhogā,
an5:227.1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā bhogesu.
an5:227.2.3_0: Bhoge nissāya attānaṁ sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṁ pariharati,
an5:227.2.3_1: mātāpitaro sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṁ pariharati,
an5:227.2.3_2: puttadāradāsakammakaraporise sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṁ pariharati,
an5:227.2.3_3: mittāmacce sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṁ pariharati,
an5:227.2.3_4: samaṇabrāhmaṇesu uddhaggikaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ patiṭṭhāpeti sovaggikaṁ sukhavipākaṁ saggasaṁvattanikaṁ.
an5:227.2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā bhogesū”ti.
an5:228.1.3_0: Ye te atithī pāhunā, te na kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5:228.1.4_0: yā tā balipaṭiggāhikā devatā, tā na kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5:228.1.5_0: ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā ekabhattikā rattūparatā viratā vikālabhojanā, te na kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5:228.2.3_0: Ye te atithī pāhunā, te kālena paṭipūjenti;

an5:229.2.1_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcime ādīnavā mātugāme.

an5:231.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu abhāvanīyo hoti.

an5:232.1.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5:232.1.3_1: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
an5:232.1.4_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5:232.1.4_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
an5:232.1.5_0: kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an5:232.1.6_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5:232.1.7_0: āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5:232.1.8_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
